Coffee: You can find as much coffee as you need at the Cafeteria, located in A6106 :coffee:
Help: Do you want to know about meals? You can ask me about :arrow_down:
Schedule: Are you hungry? This is the meals schedule :arrow_down:
Snacks: Do you want some snacks? :thinking_face: Go to the Cafeteria (A6106) and grabbing some! There are two Midnight Snacks on Friday and Saturday night waiting for you :wink:
Special: Are you vegetarian or vegan? Are you intolerant? Any allergy? No worries, all meals are ready for all public. Every meal will be correctly tagged with a detailed description of what are you eating :blush:
Where: All meals will be served front of A5 and A6 buildings. Check HackUPC Maps for more information :blush: hackupc.com/live#/map/#/meal
Which: For the first night, we will have a catering which will be serving salads, pasta, cannelloni, chicken, meatballs, etc. A typical and awesome paella for Saturday lunch. For sure, don't forget the PIZZA time during Saturday dinner. And last but not least frankfurt and burgers in Sunday lunch. :blush:
